channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The AI boom is over — here’s your bubble survival guide
item.description: Everyone’s asking the wrong question about an AI bubble. Here are the stocks to buy — and when.

item.title: Hershey’s Halloween sales have disappointed, but there’s hope for last-minute buying
item.description: Hershey said Halloween sales have been soft this year but last-minute buying is expected to bring the business up to 2024 levels.

item.title: I’m planning to retire at 65 when my twins are 15. How will this impact their healthcare coverage?
item.description: “By retiring when they are in the 10th grade my income will be low when they apply for college scholarships.”

item.title: It’s ‘Top Gun’ in orbit: Future wars will be fought in space — and these stocks are lifting off
item.description: Space is the next frontier for the U.S. and China to fight over.

item.title: Here’s how Nvidia’s Jensen Huang answers the AI bubble question
item.description: Jensen Huang thinks AI is now useful to people and companies , and it’s profitable and so corporates will want to invest more.

item.title: Apple’s latest earnings came in hot thanks to the iPhone 17. Here’s how analysts are reacting
item.description: For the most part, Apple's fiscal fourth-quarter results has analysts thinking the stock is primed for more gains going forward.

item.title: This biotech stock has jumped nearly 50% in 3 months. Its CEO says business is 'growing substantially'
item.description: Rigel Pharmaceuticals has landed on CNBC's list of top performing stocks of companies located in San Francisco.

item.title: An impulse move higher is beginning in this big bank stock, according to the charts
item.description: David Keller breaks down the technical outlook on this large money center bank.

item.title: History shows these companies reporting earnings next week tend to beat expectations
item.description: Wingstop, Arista Networks and Shopify are among the stocks that could beat expectations next week and then see a post-earnings rise in their shares.
